data.title: SkillStorm
data.meta_description: As a global leader in launching and accelerating tech careers, SkillStorm enables Stormers and the clients we support to go further.
data.text:
Vince is a co-founder and chairman of SkillStorm since our foundation in 2002. Co-founded SGIS which was acquired by Salient Federal Solutions in June, 2010. At the time of sale, SGIS had over 800 employees and 14 offices nationwide and had been ranked the 2nd fastest growing private government contractor in the country by Washington Technology Magazine. Bachelor’s in Communications, Journalism, and Advertising from University of Central Florida.

Hany is a co-founder and chairman of SkillStorm since our foundation in 2002. Co-founded SGIS which was acquired by Salient Federal Solutions in June, 2010. At the time of sale, SGIS had over 800 employees and 14 offices nationwide and had been ranked the 2nd fastest growing private government contractor in the country by Washington Technology Magazine. Bachelor’s in Electrical Engineering from University of Central Florida.

Joe has over 20 years experience helping scale education, technology and training organizations across North America and Europe. Previous roles include COO and Executive Vice President of Partnerships at Revature and senior leadership positions with Pearson and Blackboard. Joe holds an Honors degree in Information Systems and Business Administration from the University of Northampton, and started his career as a software developer in London.

Aanand is a Managing Director at Achieve Partners, a private equity firm focused on “learning and earning.” Aanand primarily focuses on making investments into and acquisitions of business services, technology services and healthcare services companies that are committed to narrowing the “skills gap” through building custom pathways to economic opportunity into their product offerings.

Suzette Kent is a global business transformation executive and, most recently, served as the Federal Chief Information Officer for the United States. She currently leads her own advisory business through which she continues strategic transformation work with clients around the world, across industries, and in the public and private sectors. Throughout her career, her focus has always centered on ways that technology can be leveraged to solve challenges.

Carter is internationally recognized for his cross-sector successes in philanthropy, education and technology. He is currently managing principal of Expectant Advisory and the executive director of the Aspen Institute Socrates Program. Carter will advise SkillStorm on strategies to create organizational cultures where all are given the opportunity to belong and thrive, with a strategic focus on Skillstorm’s NexGen, IT Apprenticeship and Accelerator Programs.

As the Chief Financial Officer, Chad leads our finance and accounting functions. Prior to joining SkillStorm in 2023, Chad was with PriceWaterhouseCoopers for 12 years, where he held senior roles in audit and accounting advisory within the Deals practice. Chad has a BS in Accounting from Florida State University and is a CPA.

Ben leads our legal function and serves as corporate secretary to the company’s board of directors. Major in the Air Force Reserve Judge Advocate General Corps (JAG) and is currently the general counsel to the Commander of the 622nd Civil Engineering Group at Dobbins Air Reserve Base. Over 16 years of military service including Active Duty Army service as an enlisted combat medic. Bachelor’s degree from Robert Morris University and a juris doctorate degree from the Duquesne University School of Law.

Alan brings deep expertise to our recruitment of exceptional talent. Previous roles include: SVP for Recruitment at Revature; SVP of Recruitment for Pearson Online Learning Services; and Managing Director at Compass Knowledge, and 20 years in enrollment management in higher education. Bachelor’s in Political Science from University of North Carolina – Chapel Hill and a Master’s in College Student Personnel from Bowling Green State University.

David is responsible for growing and managing business with the clients and partners of Pegasystems, Inc. Prior roles include: Global Vice President for training, enablement, and ecosystem development at Pegasystems; Global Head of Industry Solutions Marketing at EMC Corporation (now Dell Technologies). MBA in Marketing from Boston College, serves on the Board of Directors at Trinity Boston Connects, and is also active in Bates College’s Alumni in Admission and the Boston College Technology and Entrepreneurship Council.

Joe’s passion is helping business partners solution business “problems”, building a roadmap that enables them to achieve their solution objective and, in-turn, provide, accountable, end-to-end ownership throughout the delivery of the roadmap. Following his passion has led to fruitful career, primarily working in the Health Care industry. Joe brings 15+ years of Health Care experience to the Skillstorm team; most recently as Sr. Director of Systems Strategy and Operations Planning at CVS Health. Prior roles include various leadership positions focused on process improvement and program management across several operations such as Specialty Pharmacy and Medicare Part-D. He has a Bachelors in Accounting and a Masters in Business Administration both from Youngstown State University.

Eric joined SkillStorm in 2023 and is leading efforts for Upskilling. Eric began his career as a classroom teacher and co-founded a children’s online learning company during the dot-com. Eric spent 13 years with Microsoft in public sector sales and workforce development and most recently worked with AWS for four years, leading the Americas and Europe teams focused on public funding for adult workforce development.

Eric is married with two adult sons and lives in Cape Coral, FL. He enjoys mountain biking, paddleboarding, and fishing.

Natalie joined SkillStorm in 2019 and is responsible for the recruitment team for the NexGen division. She has 10 plus years of experience in both recruiting and leadership. She has her Bachelor’s degree in Business Marketing from St John’s University.

Lauren joined SkillStorm in 2020 and is responsible for the marketing execution and strategy for the sales and recruitment teams. Prior to SkillStorm, she worked for a large RPO organization, managing lead generation and overall marketing support for the sales team. She earned her bachelor’s degree in Communications with a focus in Journalism from the University of North Florida.

John has trained more than 100 software engineers using immersive training curriculums in preparation of the students moving directly onto a client project and through a variety of training modalities for corporate technical training engagements. John was part of a team of trainers responsible for training over 1,000 internal client employees in the United States, Europe, and Asia in the second quarter of 2021. John has earned a bachelor’s degree and a master’s degree in computer science – app/game development. John holds numerous certifications and has experience in several development languages.

Valerie holds a B.S.B.A. in Business Management and is a CompTIA Technical Trainer, Amazon Authorized Instructor, and PMI Authorized Instructor. She began her IT career working as a systems specialist for Leidos before transitioning to a role in network administration for US Army Landstuhl. Valerie has led trainings in cloud computing, DevOps tools, project management, and networking and is passionate about employee management, business development, and information technology.

Rebecca began her journey with Skillstorm in 2021. As the Human Resources Director, she plays a pivotal role in shaping the company’s people strategy and ensuring its urgent, precise and engaged workforce thrives. As a retired US Air Force member with over 20 years of service as a Bioenvironmental Engineering Technician, Technical Training Instructor and closed her military chapter as a First Sergeant. Bachelor’s in Emergency and Disaster Management from American Military University. a Master’s in Occupational Safety Management from Embry Riddle Aeronautical University and is a Certified Professional in Human Resources.

John was a Marine for 28 years, retiring as a Lieutenant Colonel. He brings experience as Chief of Staff and a decade on Wall Street to SkillStorm. Most recently John developed and lead a globally recognized program that successfully upskilled many transitioning military and veterans. At SkillStorm, he’ll direct the expansion of this strategic initiative. John graduated from Seton Hall University with a Communication Degree and was also on their basketball team, playing in the Big East Conference.

Ken joined SkillStorm in the fall of 2021. As an Account Director, he plays a vital role in cultivating long-lasting relationships with our clients and is passionate about doing so. He brings discipline, integrity, and attention to detail to every project. Ken also strives to accelerate opportunities for his fellow stormers. Before SkillStorm, Ken served with the Virginia Department of Veterans Affairs and spent almost 8 years in the Marine Corps as a Military Policeman where he served in Afghanistan and the Presidential Helicopter Squadron (HMX-1).

Hanadi joined SkillStorm in 2020 and has held the roles of Delivery Manager for NexGen and Lead Account Manager for multiple strategic client accounts before being promoted to Director. Hanadi has 16 years of experience in journalism, public relations, leadership, and recruiting. Worked as journalist and TV host in Bethlehem, Palestine. Hanadi holds two Bachelor’s degrees (Cum Laude) in Business Administration and Hotel Management.

Jon has led SAP and Full-Stack Java Development cohorts for multiple clients as part of SkillStorm’s immersive instructor-led training division. A web developer for over 20 years, prior roles include owner and creative director of a media design firm serving healthcare-industry networks and national non-profits. A CompTIA Certified Technical Trainer and Oracle Certified Professional, he holds numerous certifications in SAP, Java, and Amazon Web Services, including the SAP on AWS Specialty.

Julianne is an accomplished Senior Sales Leader with extensive experience in leadership roles within Big 4 and Fortune 500 companies. She worked in diverse industries including Public Sector, Financial Services, Manufacturing, Enterprise and more. Julianne uniquely positions herself to tackle complex strategic and transformational challenges while developing long-term, trusted partnerships and providing software, product, and security services solutions. At SkillStorm, Julianne will leverage her sales and business expertise to foster relationships and drive federal business growth with technology partners.

Brian joined SkillStorm in the Summer of 2021 and is a highly skilled leader who heads the Java Full-stack training team at SkillStorm. He oversees trainers who deliver comprehensive instruction in Java Fullstack, Data Engineering, and .NET, while also serving as the technical practice lead for all cloud initiatives. With an impressive repertoire of 14 certifications, including AWS DevOps Engineer Professional and AWS Champion Authorized Instructor, Brian is a recognized expert in his field.

The world’s leading companies partner with SkillStorm to develop purpose-built tech teams at scale, custom designed to meet their future workforce needs. SkillStorm is the leader in delivering Cloud, Cyber, Java Full Stack, Robotics, Automation Engineers, and more across the U.S.
